attributes.action: do all he can to STOP ANIMAL TESTING
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions and millions of not only mice and monkeys but cats, dogs and in some cases horses die every single year just so we can have the perfect toothpaste of make-up. I say we put a stop to all of this and encourage the PM to do all he can in his power to help put an EU wide ban on animal testing.
